item.title: APS Chapter 1-5 Summary Part
item.description: Chapter One People throught history have used public speaking as a vital means of communication and empowerment(n.赋权). Because you will live the rest of your life in a globalized world, the need for English public speaking will almost surely touch you at some time. item.title: 线性判别分析LDA
item.description: 讨论范围 二分类问题。 有监督学习。 保证数据可分性。 线性判别分析LDA Fisher线性判别。 linear discriminant analysis 把样本都投影到一个方向上，在一维空间中确定一个

安装hogo 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 brew install hugo hugo new site my_site cd my_site git submodule add https://github.com/xianmin/hugo-theme-jane.git themes/jane echo 'theme="jane"' >> config.toml cp themes/jane/exampleSite/full-config.toml config.toml 本地预览 hugo server 生成 hugo git init git add . git commit -m “init my blog” git remote add origin https://github.com/meteorecital/meteorecital.github.io.git git push -u origin master
